document.full_text: the cleveland city employee whose april fools' day prank brought police, fire and emergency medical workers to city hall was handed a 10-day suspension without pay on wednesday after a two-day disciplinary hearing.
document.title: cleveland city employee suspended for april fools' joke
lines_and_colors: the cleveland city employee whose april fools' day prank brought police, fire and emergency medical workers to city hall was handed a 10-day suspension without pay on wednesday after a two-day disciplinary hearing.
